metadata.title: CVE-2024-1013 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds stack write flaw was found in unixODBC on 64-bitarchitectures where the caller has 4 bytes and callee writes 8 bytes. Thisissue may go unnoticed on little-endian architectures, while big-endianarchitectures can be broken.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-1013` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libodbc2 - 2.3.12-1ubuntu0.23.10.1
libodbccr2 - 2.3.12-1ubuntu0.23.10.1
libodbcinst2 - 2.3.12-1ubuntu0.23.10.1
odbcinst - 2.3.12-1ubuntu0.23.10.1
unixodbc - 2.3.12-1ubuntu0.23.10.1
unixodbc-common - 2.3.12-1ubuntu0.23.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unixodbc package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.12-1ubuntu0.23.10.1').
